content.text:
Learn how to add security to your apps, APIs, and infrastructure. So you can spend less time on auth and more time on everything else.

Agenda (Day 1)

10:00 AM - 10:30 AM PDT Platform Open + Chat Rooms
10:30 AM - 11:15 AM PDT Opening Keynote
11:30 AM - 1:30 PM PDT Breakout Sessions
1:45 PM - 2:15 PM PDT Closing Keynote
2:15 PM - 4:00 PM PDT Chat Rooms
(See the event page for full details on the agenda)

Agenda (Day 2 Labs)

8:00 AM - 9:30 AM PDT Introduction to OAuth and OpenID Connect - Aaron Parecki
10:00 AM - 11:30 AM PDT Auth0
12:00 PM - 1:30 PM PDT Terraform
2:00 PM - 3:30 PM PDT DevOps with JFrog
4:00 PM - 5:30 PM PDT Protect Your APIs with OAuth
Full details

Hosted by Okta and Auth0
